newsitem.title: UK: Yorkshire up on U.S. bid reports.
newsitem.headline: Yorkshire up on U.S. bid reports.

text.p: Shares in Yorkshire Electicity Plc rose early on Monday after a report in the Sunday Telegraph said Entergy Corp of the U.S. was considering a 1.3 billion stg bid for the UK utility.
Yorkshire shares were up 8p at 743-1/2 by 0857 GMT in thin trading of just 84,321 shares.
A spokesman for Yorkshire said the report was no-more than market speculation. "We have not had any approaches and we are not in any talks," he said.
